Original:
常常跑全台各種酒吧，今天想就近在三峽找個舒服的環境，剛好想到收藏已久的Bar Royal，入內後氣氛裝潢都不錯，座位多樣性，吧台、3人座位、小包廂，提供各種不同人數的需求。
酒的部分，調酒師以前在台北知名酒吧上班過，實力不容小覷，點了幾款常點的威士忌經典調酒也試了他們獨有的咖啡調酒，經典的部分沒讓我失望，咖啡調酒也有獨到的特色，相當喜歡。
聽說之後還會調整店內裝潢以及酒吧的氛圍，值得期待。
EN:
Often running all kinds of bars in Taiwan. I want to find a comfortable environment in the Three Gorges near the Three Gorges today. I just think of the long -lasting Bar Royal. After entering the internal, the atmosphere is good and the seats are diverse. The needs of different people.
In the wine part, the bartender used to work in a well -known bar in Taipei before, and the strength could not be underestimated. I ordered a few regular whiskey classic bartending and tried their unique coffee bartending. The classic part did not disappoint me. Coffee bartending also has unique features and likes it quite.
I heard that the interior decoration of the store and the atmosphere of the bar will be adjusted, which is worth looking forward to.
